title: Impact of Background Music on Mathematics Learning Retention: Multimedia Utilization Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical analysis skills and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Environment where working professionals taking math job training access materials via diverse devices (tablets, laptops, etc.) and periodically verify learning outcomes through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the correlation between background music types and learning retention rates with over 80% accuracy
Learners can present three or more optimal strategies for applying background music to multimedia content
Learners can design formative assessment tools to measure the effectiveness of music utilization in self-directed learning environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
